Author: RuinedSwan
Text: The good thing is that you have awareness enough to call yourself out on it. My ED means I think mean shit about other people too. I try to catch myself and tell myself that just my disorder trying to help me feel superior. And to knock that shit off. Then I try to do something that makes me feel good like a hobby of mine, music I like, or something I'm good at. Helps scratch the itch the mean thought was trying to satisfy.

Author: cryingfaeries
Text: I am going through the exact same thing, itâ€™s not easy, but love and friendship have to prevail over everything
